channel.title: Development on Plus-F
channel.description: Recent content in Development on Plus-F

item.title: In The Beginning
item.description: Why did I bother writing +F? There are already plenty of fully-featured, freely-available Spectrum emulators for more or less any platform you care to think of. Indeed, I remember using a perfectly playable one on the Commodore Amiga as far back as 1994 or 1995 (ZXAM by Antonio J. Pomar Rosell√≥), so it’s hardly a novel idea. I did have a little twist which I wanted to add, which at the time I started writing didn’t appear to be available in any other emulator, namely the ability to play games across the Internet.
